name: Dodgeball (itch) (Plucky)
description:
What is DODGEBALL?

Dodgeball is an arcade game inspired by dodgeball made by Joe Mills (Plucky Games) and James Farrington. Dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge around the small arena gaining points by narrowly avoiding being hit by balls, catching balls and by throwing them and hitting opponents! 

Controls

There's an integrated tutorial if you wait on the title screen for a short while.

If you're really too impatient:

  • WASD: move up down left right
  • LeftShift: Dash a short distance
  • Space: Catch when a ball is close to you
  • Left Click: Throw the ball at the mouse location 
Scoring

Gain points by:

  • Narrowly avoiding dodges: 50 points!
  • Catching a ball: 100 points!
  • Throwing and hitting an enemy with a ball: 200 points!

Submitted for Scorespace Jam #13
